title: Elon Musk Urges Followers to Vote Republican in Midterm Elections
description: The new owner of Twitter has urged his followers to vote Republican.
dc:creator: Adam Satariano, Ryan Mac and Tiffany Hsu
media:credit: ZZ/Wil R/Star Max, via Associated Press
media:description: Elon Musk, the new owner of Twitter, urged his 115 million followers on Twitter to vote Republican in Tuesdayâ€™s midterm elections.
